mapper.insert: insert into ROOMATE_BOARD values (ROOMATE_BOARD_SEQ.nextval, default, #{rLocation}, #{rbTitle}, #{rbContent}, #{rbWriter}, default, sysdate, sysdate, default, #{rRentType}, #{rLivingType}, #{rRoomCount}, #{rFloor}, #{rPrice}, #{rParking}, #{rReqGender}, #{originalFileName}, #{renameFileName})
mapper.select:
select * from ROOMATE_BOARD where RBSTATUS = 'Y'
and rlocation='서울' and rlocation='인천/부천' and rlocation='수원/경기' and rlocation='대구/경북' and rlocation='부산/경남' and rlocation='충청/강원' and rlocation='광주/전라'
order by RBID desc
select * from ROOMATE_BOARD where rbId = #{rbId} and RBSTATUS = 'Y'
select * from reply r join ROOMATE_BOARD b on r.bcode=b.bcode and r.refbid = b.rbid where refbid = #{rbId}
mapper.insert: insert into reply values (REPLY_SEQ.nextval, #{bCode}, #{rContent}, #{refbId}, #{rWriter},sysdate, sysdate, default)
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ROOMATE_BOARD where RBSTATUS='Y'
